t: Amazon.com: Customer reviews: Tontron Adult Safety Hiking Climbing Caving Work Helmet (Black, Large)
s: This is a high quality copy of another well known helmet brand/model....with exceptions. The Tontron helmet has a ‘deeper’ fit, meaning more of your head is inside the helmet (fit was better for my head than the kask sp) The lining is very nice, on par with a high end bicycle helmet.
